root.name: Space Colony
root.description: OverviewThe game's seven protagonists go to live in a space colony: six of them are human, and the other is an alien creature, and each of them has a background story of their own. It is the player's responsibility to make sure they survive in the space colony. To do so, they will have to fulfill their basic needs, accomplish missions, and fulfill their duties so that the Space Colony may grow bigger and mightier. The challenge of the game resides in keeping the protagonists happy and healthy, in order for them to execute important tasks such as building defenses to protect the colony from alien attacks. In time more people will join your colony, as it grows bigger.
